trans-unit.source: Contains a cache of XML Schema definition language (XSD) schemas.
Do not use schemas from unknown or untrusted sources or locations.
trans-unit.target: Não use esquemas de fontes desconhecidas ou não confiáveis ou locais.

trans-unit.source: Doing so will compromise the security of your code.
trans-unit.target: Isso comprometerá a segurança do seu código.

trans-unit.source: XML schemas (including inline schemas) are inherently vulnerable to denial of service attacks; do not accept them in untrusted scenarios.
trans-unit.target: Esquemas XML (incluindo esquemas embutidos) são inerentemente vulneráveis a ataques negação de serviço; não aceitá-los em cenários não confiáveis.

trans-unit.source: Schema validation error messages and exceptions may expose sensitive information about the content model or URI paths to the schema file.
trans-unit.target: Exceções e mensagens de erro de validação de esquema podem expor informações confidenciais sobre o modelo de conteúdo ou o caminho de URI para o arquivo de esquema.

trans-unit.source: Be careful not to expose this information to untrusted callers.
trans-unit.target: Tenha cuidado para não expor essas informações para chamadores não confiáveis.

trans-unit.source: Additional security considerations are covered in the "Security Considerations" section.
trans-unit.target: Considerações de segurança adicionais são abordadas na seção "Considerações sobre segurança".

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> is a cache or library where you can store XML Schema definition language (XSD) schemas.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> é um cache ou a biblioteca onde você pode armazenar os esquemas de linguagem XSD de definição de esquema XML.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> improves performance by caching schemas in memory instead of accessing them from a file or a URL.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> melhora o desempenho armazenando em cache os esquemas na memória em vez de acessá-lo de um arquivo ou URL.

trans-unit.source: Each schema is identified by the namespace URI and location that was specified when the schema was added to the set.
trans-unit.target: Cada esquema é identificado pelo namespace URI e local que foi especificado quando o esquema foi adicionado ao conjunto.

trans-unit.source: You use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.Schemas%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to assign the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> object an XML reader should use for data validation.
trans-unit.target: Você usa o <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings.Schemas%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade para atribuir o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> deve usar um leitor de XML para validação de dados do objeto.

trans-unit.source: Security Considerations
trans-unit.target: Considerações sobre segurança

trans-unit.source: Do not use schemas from unknown or untrusted sources.
trans-unit.target: Não use esquemas de fontes desconhecidas ou não confiáveis.

trans-unit.source: Doing so will compromise the security of your code.
trans-unit.target: Isso comprometerá a segurança do seu código.

trans-unit.source: External namespaces or locations referenced in include, import, and redefine elements of a schema are resolved with respect to the base URI of the schema that includes or imports them.
trans-unit.target: Incluem namespaces externos ou locais referenciados no, importar e elementos de redefinição de um esquema são resolvidos em relação ao URI de base do esquema que inclui ou importá-los.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the base URI of the including or importing schema is empty or `null`, the external locations are resolved with respect to the current directory.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se o URI de base do incluindo ou Importando esquema está vazio ou `null`, os locais externos são resolvidos em relação ao diretório atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver> class is used to resolve external schemas by default.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver> classe é usada para resolver esquemas externos por padrão.

trans-unit.source: To disable resolution of include, import, and redefine elements of a schema, set the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.XmlResolver%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Para desabilitar a resolução de inclusão, importar e redefinir a elementos de um esquema, defina o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.XmlResolver%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade `null`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> class uses the <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex?displayProperty=nameWithType> class to parse and match regular expressions in an XML schema.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> classe usa a <xref:System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex?displayProperty=nameWithType> classe para analisar e correspondem a expressões regulares em um esquema XML.

trans-unit.source: Validation of pattern facets with regular expressions in an XML schema may involve increased CPU usage and should be avoided in high availability scenarios.
trans-unit.target: Validação das facetas de padrão com expressões regulares em um esquema XML pode envolver um aumento no uso da CPU e deve ser evitada em cenários de alta disponibilidade.

trans-unit.source: Exceptions raised as a result of using the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> class, such as the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException> class may contain sensitive information that should not be exposed in untrusted scenarios.
trans-unit.target: Exceções geradas como resultado do uso de <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> classe, como o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException> classe pode conter informações confidenciais que não devem ser expostas em cenários não confiáveis.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException.SourceUri%2A> property of an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException> returns the URI path to the schema file that caused the exception.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException.SourceUri%2A> propriedade de um <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException> retorna o caminho URI para o arquivo de esquema que causou a exceção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException.SourceUri%2A> property should not be exposed in untrusted scenarios.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException.SourceUri%2A> propriedade não deve ser exposta em cenários não confiáveis.

trans-unit.source: Exceptions should be properly handled so that this sensitive information is not exposed in untrusted scenarios.
trans-unit.target: Exceções devem ser tratadas corretamente para que informações confidenciais não são expostas em cenários não confiáveis.

trans-unit.source: The following example validates an XML file using schemas stored in the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir valida um arquivo XML usando esquemas armazenados no <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>.

trans-unit.source: The namespace in the XML file, `urn:bookstore-schema`, identifies which schema in the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> to use for validation.
trans-unit.target: O namespace no arquivo XML, `urn:bookstore-schema`, identifica qual esquema no <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> a ser usado para validação.

trans-unit.source: Input
trans-unit.target: Entrada

trans-unit.source: The sample uses the following two input files.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo usa os dois arquivos de entrada a seguir.

trans-unit.source: **booksSchemaFail.xml:**
trans-unit.target: **booksSchemaFail.xml:**

trans-unit.source: **books.xsd:**
trans-unit.target: **books.xsd:**

trans-unit.source: Output
trans-unit.target: Saída

trans-unit.source: Validation Error: The element 'book' in namespace 'urn:bookstore-schema' has invalid child element 'author' in namespace 'urn:bookstore-schema'.
trans-unit.target: Erro de validação: O elemento 'book' no namespace 'urn:bookstore-schema' tem um elemento filho inválido 'author' no namespace 'urn:bookstore-schema'.

trans-unit.source: Expected 'title' in namespace 'urn:bookstore-schema'.
trans-unit.target: Esperado 'title' no namespace 'urn:bookstore-schema'.

trans-unit.source: Validation Error: The element 'author' in namespace 'urn:bookstore-schema' has invalid child element 'name' in namespace 'urn:bookstore-schema'.
trans-unit.target: Erro de validação: O elemento 'author' no namespace 'urn:bookstore-schema' tem um elemento filho inválido 'name' no namespace 'urn:bookstore-schema'.

trans-unit.source: Expected 'first-name' in namespace 'urn:bookstore-schema'.
trans-unit.target: Esperado 'first-name' no namespace 'urn:bookstore-schema'.

Otherwise, an <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException" /> is thrown.
If the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> object already exists in the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Add%2A> method does nothing.

trans-unit.source: The functionality of this method is identical to that of the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: A funcionalidade desse método é idêntica do <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Add%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The schema is not valid.
The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> object passed as a parameter is <see langword="null" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" /> object.
Adds all the XML Schema definition language (XSD) schemas in the given <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" /> to the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" />.
Before a schema can be added to an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>, it has to be successfully preprocessed.
trans-unit.target: Antes de um esquema pode ser adicionado a um <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>, ele deve ser processado com êxito.

trans-unit.source: Preprocessing performs the following basic tasks.
trans-unit.target: Pré-processamento executa as seguintes tarefas básicas.

trans-unit.source: The schema is checked for structural validity according to the rules of W3C XML Schema, but the schema is not fully validated.
trans-unit.target: O esquema é verificado quanto à validade estrutural acordo com as regras do esquema de XML da W3C, mas o esquema não está completamente validado.

trans-unit.source: References to internal and external schema components are resolved.
trans-unit.target: Referências a componentes de esquema internos e externos são resolvidas.

trans-unit.source: Any imported or included schemas that are successfully retrieved are also added to the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>.
trans-unit.target: Esquemas importadas ou incluídas que são recuperadas com êxito também são adicionadas para o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>.

trans-unit.source: Imported schemas are added as separate <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> objects, and included schemas are made a part of the including <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>.
trans-unit.target: Esquemas importados são adicionadas como separada <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> objetos e esquemas incluídos tornam-se parte do incluindo <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.IsCompiled%2A> property of the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> to add is `true`, all schemas in the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> to add are added to the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.IsCompiled%2A> propriedade do <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> adicionar é `true`, todos os esquemas a <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> para adicionar são adicionados ao <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.IsCompiled%2A> property of the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> to add is `false`, each schema added is preprocessed before being added.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.IsCompiled%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> adicionar é `false`, cada esquema adicionada é pré-processados antes de serem adicionados.

trans-unit.source: If any of the schemas in the newly added <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> fails to be preprocessed, no schemas are added; instead, an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se qualquer um dos esquemas recém-adicionado <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> falhar ser processado, nenhum esquemas são adicionados; em vez disso, um <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException> é gerada.

trans-unit.source: As a result, the following two code example are not equivalent.
trans-unit.target: Como resultado, o exemplo de código de dois a seguir não são equivalentes.

trans-unit.source: The previous two code examples are not equivalent.
trans-unit.target: Os exemplos de código de dois anterior não são equivalentes.

trans-unit.source: In the first example, if an invalid schema exists in `schemaSet1` and its <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.IsCompiled%2A> property is set to `false`, no schemas are added to `schemaSet`.
trans-unit.target: No primeiro exemplo, se existir um esquema inválido no `schemaSet1` e sua <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.IsCompiled%2A> está definida como `false`, não há esquemas são adicionados ao `schemaSet`.

trans-unit.source: In the second example, a number of schemas can be added to `schemaSet` before an invalid schema is encountered and an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: No segundo exemplo, um número de esquemas pode ser adicionado ao `schemaSet` antes de um esquema inválido é encontrado e uma exceção será lançada.

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates adding schemas to an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>, then adding the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> to a new <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> using the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir ilustra os esquemas adicionando a um <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>, adicionando o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> para um novo <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> usando o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Add%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: A schema in the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" /> is not valid.
The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" /> object passed as a parameter is <see langword="null" />.
The schema <c>targetNamespace</c> property, or <see langword="null" /> to use the <c>targetNamespace</c> specified in the schema.
The URL that specifies the schema to load.
Adds the XML Schema definition language (XSD) schema at the URL specified to the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" />.
An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> object if the schema is valid.
If the schema is not valid and a <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler" /> is specified, then <see langword="null" /> is returned and the appropriate validation event is raised.
Otherwise, an <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException" /> is thrown.
Before a schema can be added to an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>, it has to be successfully preprocessed.
trans-unit.target: Antes de um esquema pode ser adicionado a um <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>, ele deve ser processado com êxito.

trans-unit.source: Preprocessing performs the following basic tasks.
trans-unit.target: Pré-processamento executa as seguintes tarefas básicas.

trans-unit.source: The schema is checked for structural validity according to the rules of W3C XML Schema, but the schema is not fully validated.
trans-unit.target: O esquema é verificado quanto à validade estrutural acordo com as regras do esquema de XML da W3C, mas o esquema não está completamente validado.

trans-unit.source: References to internal and external schema components are resolved.
trans-unit.target: Referências a componentes de esquema internos e externos são resolvidas.

trans-unit.source: Any imported or included schemas that are successfully retrieved are also added to the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>.
trans-unit.target: Esquemas importadas ou incluídas que são recuperadas com êxito também são adicionadas para o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>.

trans-unit.source: Imported schemas are added as separate <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> objects, and included schemas are made a part of the including <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>.
trans-unit.target: Esquemas importados são adicionadas como separada <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> objetos e esquemas incluídos tornam-se parte do incluindo <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>.

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Eis as observações importantes a considerar ao usar o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Add%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Adding a schema to the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> with the same target namespace and schema location URL as a schema already contained within the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> will return the original schema object.
trans-unit.target: Adicionando um esquema para o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> com o mesmo namespace e o esquema de URL de local de destino como um esquema já está contido dentro de <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> retornará o objeto de esquema original.

trans-unit.source: When a new schema is successfully added to an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.IsCompiled%2A> property of the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Quando um novo esquema foi adicionado com êxito para um <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>, o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.IsCompiled%2A> propriedade do <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> é definido como `false`.

trans-unit.source: Any include or import elements encountered in an XML schema are resolved when the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Add%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Qualquer elemento de inclusão ou importação em um esquema XML é resolvidas quando o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Add%2A> método é chamado.

trans-unit.source: Failure to resolve include and import elements results in a schema validation warning and if no <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.ValidationEventHandler> has been specified for the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> object, these warning will not be reported.
trans-unit.target: Falha ao resolver incluir e importar resultados de elementos em um aviso de validação de esquema e se nenhum <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.ValidationEventHandler> foi especificado para o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> objeto, eles aviso não será registrado.

trans-unit.source: If a schema with the same target namespace as a schema that already exists in the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> is added to the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>, both schemas are added.
trans-unit.target: Se um esquema com o mesmo namespace de destino como um esquema que já existe no <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> é adicionada para o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>, ambos os esquemas são adicionados.

trans-unit.source: This behavior differs from the obsolete <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Esse comportamento difere do obsoleto <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> has the ability to use the target namespace defined in a schema, rather than requiring the target namespace be specified as a parameter when the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Add%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Add%2A> método o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> tem a capacidade de usar o namespace de destino definidas em um esquema, em vez de exigir o namespace de destino ser especificado como um parâmetro quando o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Add%2A> método é chamado.

trans-unit.source: Specifying `null` in the `targetNamespace` parameter of the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Add%2A> method instructs the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> to use the target namespace defined in the schema, as illustrated in the following code example.
trans-unit.target: Especificando `null` no `targetNamespace` parâmetro o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Add%2A> instrui o método o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> para usar o namespace de destino definido no esquema, conforme ilustrado no exemplo de código a seguir.

trans-unit.source: In the code example above, `null` is specified as the `targetNamespace` parameter to the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo de código acima, `null` é especificado como o `targetNamespace` parâmetro para o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Add%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: As a result, the `targetNamespace` defined in the books.xml file is used.
trans-unit.target: Como resultado, o `targetNamespace` definido o Books arquivo é usado.

trans-unit.source: In this case, the result of calling the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Add%2A> method would be identical if http://www.contoso.com/books had been specified as the `targetNamespace` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, o resultado da chamada de <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Add%2A> método seria idêntico se http://www.contoso.com/books tivesse sido especificado como o `targetNamespace` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: W3C XML Schema allows schemas without a target namespace to be included in schemas with a target namespace defined.
trans-unit.target: Esquema de XML da W3C permite que esquemas sem um namespace de destino devem ser incluídos em esquemas com um namespace de destino definido.

trans-unit.source: In this case, the schema without a target namespace defined is coerced into the target namespace of the including schema.
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, o esquema sem um namespace de destino definido é forçado para o namespace de destino do esquema de inclusão.

trans-unit.source: The included schema is treated as if it had that target namespace defined.
trans-unit.target: O esquema incluído é tratado como se tivesse esse namespace de destino definido.

trans-unit.source: Similarly, schemas without a target namespace can be added to the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> and coerced into the target namespace specified by the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Add%2A> method, as illustrated in the following example.
trans-unit.target: Da mesma forma, os esquemas sem um namespace de destino podem ser adicionadas para o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> e forçado para o namespace de destino especificado pelo <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Add%2A> método, conforme ilustrado no exemplo a seguir.

trans-unit.source: If the schema above is added to the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> with the target namespace http://www.contoso.com/new/targetnamespace (as shown in the code below), it is treated as if the target namespace declared in the schema was `http://www.contoso.com/new/targetnamespace`.
trans-unit.target: Se o esquema anterior é adicionado a <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> com o namespace de destino http://www.contoso.com/new/targetnamespace (conforme mostrado no código a seguir), ele será tratado como se fosse o namespace de destino declarado no esquema `http://www.contoso.com/new/targetnamespace`.

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds the http://www.contoso.com/books.xsd schema with a target namespace of http://www.contoso.com/books to the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir adiciona o http://www.contoso.com/books.xsd esquema com um namespace de destino do http://www.contoso.com/books para o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>.

trans-unit.source: The example uses the `books.xsd` file as input.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo usa o arquivo `books.xsd` como entrada.

trans-unit.source: Preprocessing performs the following basic tasks.
trans-unit.target: Pré-processamento executa as seguintes tarefas básicas.

trans-unit.source: The schema is checked for structural validity according to the rules of W3C XML Schema, but the schema is not fully validated.
trans-unit.target: O esquema é verificado quanto à validade estrutural acordo com as regras do esquema de XML da W3C, mas o esquema não está completamente validado.

trans-unit.source: References to internal and external schema components are resolved.
trans-unit.target: Referências a componentes de esquema internos e externos são resolvidas.

trans-unit.source: Any imported or included schemas that are successfully retrieved are also added to the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>.
trans-unit.target: Esquemas importadas ou incluídas que são recuperadas com êxito também são adicionadas para o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>.

trans-unit.source: Imported schemas are added as separate <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> objects, and included schemas are made a part of the including <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>.
trans-unit.target: Esquemas importados são adicionadas como separada <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> objetos e esquemas incluídos tornam-se parte do incluindo <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>.

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Eis as observações importantes a considerar ao usar o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Add%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Successfully retrieved schemas imported or included by the schemas contained in the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> are also added to the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>.
trans-unit.target: Recuperou com êxito a esquemas importados ou incluídos pelos esquemas contidos no <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> também são adicionados para o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> is not positioned on the root element, an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException> is thrown unless the current item is an element.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> não está posicionado no elemento raiz, um <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException> é gerada, a menos que o item atual é um elemento.

trans-unit.source: If the current item is an `xs:schema` element, the schema document is read into the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>; otherwise, an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException> is thrown because the schema is not valid.
trans-unit.target: Se o item atual for um `xs:schema` elemento, o documento de esquema é lidos a <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>; caso contrário, um <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException> foi lançado porque o esquema não é válido.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> is positioned over a sequence of XML nodes, only the first node in the sequence is added.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> está posicionado em uma sequência de nós XML, apenas o primeiro nó na sequência é adicionado.

trans-unit.source: If the schema was created from a <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method call, the value of the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationFlags.ProcessInlineSchema> property is ignored, because inline schema processing is not applied for W3C XML Schema documents.
trans-unit.target: Se o esquema foi criado de um <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> chamada de método, o valor da <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationFlags.ProcessInlineSchema> propriedade será ignorada porque o processamento do esquema embutido não é aplicado a documentos de esquema de XML da W3C.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> property of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> is not used to resolve references to namespaces or schema locations in include and import elements.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> propriedade o <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> não é usado para resolver referências a namespaces ou esquema locais em incluem e importar elementos.

trans-unit.source: Instead, the <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> property of the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> is used.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, o <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> propriedade o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> é usado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> has the ability to use the target namespace defined in a schema, rather than requiring the target namespace be specified as a parameter when the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Add%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Add%2A> método o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> tem a capacidade de usar o namespace de destino definidas em um esquema, em vez de exigir o namespace de destino ser especificado como um parâmetro quando o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Add%2A> método é chamado.

trans-unit.source: Specifying `null` or <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType> to the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Add%2A> method instructs the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> to use the target namespace defined in the schema.
trans-unit.target: Especificando `null` ou <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType> para o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Add%2A> método instrui o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> para usar o namespace de destino definido no esquema.

trans-unit.source: For an example of this behavior, see the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo desse comportamento, consulte o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Add%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The remaining functionality of this method is identical to that of the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: A funcionalidade restante deste método é idêntica do <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Add%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds the books.xsd schema contained in the <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader> with a target namespace of http://www.contoso.com/books to the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir adiciona o esquema de Books contido a <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader> com um namespace de destino do http://www.contoso.com/books para o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>.

trans-unit.source: The schema is not valid.
The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> object passed as a parameter is <see langword="null" />.
Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCompilationSettings" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCompilationSettings" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCompilationSettings" /> para o <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is an <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCompilationSettings" /> instance with the <see cref="P:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCompilationSettings.EnableUpaCheck" /> property set to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é um <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCompilationSettings" /> instância com o <see cref="P:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCompilationSettings.EnableUpaCheck" /> propriedade definida como <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCompilationSettings> class specifies Unique Particle Attribution (UPA) validation options for the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCompilationSettings> classe especifica opções de validação de atribuição de partícula exclusiva (UPA) para o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>.

trans-unit.source: For more information about enabling UPA validation checks, see the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCompilationSettings.EnableUpaCheck%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como habilitar verificações de validação de UPA, consulte o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCompilationSettings.EnableUpaCheck%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Compiles the XML Schema definition language (XSD) schemas added to the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" /> into one logical schema.

This method is called automatically when validation is needed and the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> has not been previously compiled—for example, when an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> is used as an input to create an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object in the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Schemas%2A> property of an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings> object.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado automaticamente quando a validação é necessária e o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> não tiver sido compilado anteriormente — por exemplo, quando um <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> é usado como entrada para criar um <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> objeto o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Schemas%2A> propriedade de um <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings> objeto.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> is already in the compiled state, this method will not recompile the schemas.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> é já em estado compilado, esse método não recompilará os esquemas.

trans-unit.source: If this method executes successfully, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.IsCompiled%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se esse método é executado com êxito, o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.IsCompiled%2A> está definida como `true`.

trans-unit.source: Schemas that have been previously compiled by an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> are not recompiled.
trans-unit.target: Esquemas que tenham sido compilados anteriormente por uma <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> não são recompilados.

trans-unit.source: However, schemas that were compiled using the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Compile%2A> method of the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> will be recompiled.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, os esquemas que foram compilados usando o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Compile%2A> método do <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> serão recompilados.

trans-unit.source: You need to call the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Reprocess%2A> method if you have changed a schema (or one of its includes/imports) after adding it to the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>.
trans-unit.target: Você precisa chamar o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Reprocess%2A> método se você tiver alterado um esquema (ou uma de suas inclui/importações) após adicioná-lo para o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Reprocess%2A> method will check the schema for structural validity according to the rules of W3C XML Schema.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Reprocess%2A> método verificará o esquema para validade estrutural acordo com as regras do esquema de XML da W3C.

trans-unit.source: However, it will not perform a full validation check.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, ele não executará uma verificação de validação completa.

trans-unit.source: It will also resolve references to internal and external schema components.
trans-unit.target: Ela também será resolvida referências a componentes de esquema internos e externos.

trans-unit.source: Any imported or included schemas that are successfully retrieved are also added to the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>.
trans-unit.target: Esquemas importadas ou incluídas que são recuperadas com êxito também são adicionadas para o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>.

trans-unit.source: Imported schemas are added as separate <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> objects while included schemas are made part of the including <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>.
trans-unit.target: Esquemas importados são adicionadas como separada <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> objetos enquanto incluídos esquemas são fazer parte do, inclusive <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>.

trans-unit.source: If the call to reprocess is successful, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.IsCompiled%2A> property is set to false.
trans-unit.target: Se a chamada para reprocessar for bem-sucedida, o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.IsCompiled%2A> está definida como false.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when validating and compiling the schemas in the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" />.
Indicates whether an XML Schema definition language (XSD) schema is in the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" />.
The schema <c>targetNamespace</c> property.
Indicates whether an XML Schema definition language (XSD) schema with the specified target namespace URI is in the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" />.
<see langword="true" /> if a schema with the specified target namespace URI is in the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
Schemas that are indirectly added to the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> are detected by the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Contains%2A> method; for example, imported schemas.
trans-unit.target: Esquemas indiretamente são adicionados para o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> são detectados pelo <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Contains%2A> método; por exemplo, esquemas importados.

trans-unit.source: As a result, if a schema for the http://www.contoso.com/retail namespace which imports a schema for the http://www.contoso.com/books namespace is added to the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>, calling <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Contains%2A> with `http://www.contoso.com/books` as a parameter, it returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Como resultado, se um esquema para o http://www.contoso.com/retail namespace que importa um esquema para o http://www.contoso.com/books namespace é adicionado para o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>, chamar <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Contains%2A> com `http://www.contoso.com/books` como um parâmetro, ele retorna `true`.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> object.
Indicates whether the specified XML Schema definition language (XSD) <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> object is in the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" />.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> object is in the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" /> passed as a parameter is <see langword="null" />.
The array to copy the objects to.
The index in the array where copying will begin.
Copies all the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> objects from the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" /> to the given array, starting at the given index.
The following example copies all the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> objects in the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> to an array of <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> objects.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir copia todos os <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> objetos no <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> para uma matriz de <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> objetos.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of logical XML Schema definition language (XSD) schemas in the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" />.
The number of logical schemas in the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" />.
trans-unit.target: O número de esquemas lógicos a <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" />.

trans-unit.source: If there are two schemas for the namespace `http://www.contoso.com` in the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Count%2A> property would return 1 because the schemas are treated as a single logical schema for validation purposes.
trans-unit.target: Se houver dois esquemas para o namespace `http://www.contoso.com` no <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>, o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Count%2A> propriedade retornará 1 como os esquemas são tratados como um único esquema lógico para fins de validação.

trans-unit.source: However, if a schema for the namespace `http://www.contoso.com/retail` imported a schema for the `http://www.contoso.com/books` namespace, the value of the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Count%2A> property would be 2.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se um esquema para o namespace `http://www.contoso.com/retail` importados de um esquema para o `http://www.contoso.com/books` namespace, o valor da <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Count%2A> propriedade seria 2.

trans-unit.source: Gets all the global attributes in all the XML Schema definition language (XSD) schemas in the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" />.
The collection of global attributes.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de atributos global.

trans-unit.source: Gets all the global elements in all the XML Schema definition language (XSD) schemas in the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" />.
The collection of global elements.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de elementos globais.

trans-unit.source: Gets all of the global simple and complex types in all the XML Schema definition language (XSD) schemas in the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" />.
The collection of global simple and complex types.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de globais tipos simples e complexas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.GlobalTypes%2A> property always returns a type that represents the `xs:anyType` complex type.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.GlobalTypes%2A> propriedade sempre retorna um tipo que representa o `xs:anyType` tipo complexo.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the XML Schema definition language (XSD) schemas in the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" /> have been compiled.

<see langword="true" /> if the schemas in the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" /> have been compiled since the last time a schema was added or removed from the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se os esquemas no <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" /> foram compilados desde a última vez em que um esquema foi adicionado ou removido o <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.IsCompiled%2A> property is not affected if schemas are edited while in the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.IsCompiled%2A> não é afetado se os esquemas são editados quando em <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>.

trans-unit.source: Updates of the individual schemas in the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> are not tracked.
trans-unit.target: As atualizações de esquemas individuais em <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> não são controladas.

trans-unit.source: As a result, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.IsCompiled%2A> property can be `true` even though one of the schemas contained in the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> has been altered, as long as no schemas were added or removed from the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>.
trans-unit.target: Como resultado, a propriedade de <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.IsCompiled%2A> pode ser `true` mesmo que um dos esquemas contidos em <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> é modificado, como nenhum esquema foi adicionado ou removido de <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>.

trans-unit.source: For an example of the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.IsCompiled%2A> property, see the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Reprocess%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo de <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.IsCompiled%2A> propriedade, consulte o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Reprocess%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNameTable" /> used by the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" /> when loading new XML Schema definition language (XSD) schemas.
A table of atomized string objects.
trans-unit.target: Uma tabela de objetos atomizados de cadeia de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> object to remove from the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" />.
Removes the specified XML Schema definition language (XSD) schema from the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" />.

The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> object removed from the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" /> or <see langword="null" /> if the schema was not found in the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" />.
Removing a schema from the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> sets the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.IsCompiled%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Removendo um esquema do <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> define o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.IsCompiled%2A> propriedade `false`.

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates adding multiple schemas to an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>, then removing one of the schemas using the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Remove%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir ilustra a adição de vários esquemas para um <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>, em seguida, removendo um dos esquemas usando o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Remove%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The schema is not a valid schema.
The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> passed as a parameter is <see langword="null" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> object to remove from the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" />.
Removes the specified XML Schema definition language (XSD) schema and all the schemas it imports from the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" />.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> object and all its imports were successfully removed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.RemoveRecursive%2A> method removes the specified schema and all the schemas it imports from the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>, as long as there are no dependencies on the schema or its imported schemas.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.RemoveRecursive%2A> método Remove o esquema especificado e todos os esquemas que importar o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>, contanto que não há nenhuma dependência no esquema ou seus esquemas importados.

trans-unit.source: If there are dependencies on the schema or its imported schemas in the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>, nothing is removed and <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.RemoveRecursive%2A> returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se houver dependências no esquema ou seus esquemas importados no <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>, nada é removido e <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.RemoveRecursive%2A> retorna `false`.

trans-unit.source: If `false` is returned and a <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.ValidationEventHandler> is defined, a warning is sent to the event handler describing the dependencies.
trans-unit.target: Se `false` é retornado e um <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.ValidationEventHandler> é definido, um aviso é enviado ao manipulador de eventos que descreve as dependências.

trans-unit.source: If the specified schema imports other schemas and the specified schema was previously removed with the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Remove%2A> method, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.RemoveRecursive%2A> method will not remove the imported schemas and will return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se o esquema especificado importa outros esquemas e o esquema especificado anteriormente foi removido com o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Remove%2A> método, o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.RemoveRecursive%2A> método não removerá os esquemas importados e retornará `false`.

trans-unit.source: For example, if `parentSchema` imports `childSchema1` and `childSchema2` the following code will only remove `parentSchema`, but not the imported `childSchema1` and `childSchema2` schemas:
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se `parentSchema` importa `childSchema1` e `childSchema2` o código a seguir removerá apenas `parentSchema`, mas não importado `childSchema1` e `childSchema2` esquemas:

trans-unit.source: The following code will remove the `parentSchema` and the imported schemas:
trans-unit.target: O código a seguir removerá o `parentSchema` e os esquemas importados:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.RemoveRecursive%2A> method has no effect on the state of the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.IsCompiled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.RemoveRecursive%2A> método não tem nenhum efeito sobre o estado do <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.IsCompiled%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates adding multiple schemas to an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>, then removing one of the schemas and all the schemas it imports using the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.RemoveRecursive%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir ilustra a adição de vários esquemas para um <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>, e removendo um dos esquemas e todos os esquemas importada usando o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.RemoveRecursive%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> passed as a parameter is <see langword="null" />.
The schema to reprocess.
Reprocesses an XML Schema definition language (XSD) schema that already exists in the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" />.
An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> object if the schema is a valid schema.
If the schema is not valid and a <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler" /> is specified, <see langword="null" /> is returned and the appropriate validation event is raised.
Otherwise, an <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException" /> is thrown.
Reprocessing a schema performs all the preprocessing steps performed on a schema when the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Add%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Reprocessar um esquema executa todas as etapas de pré-processamento executadas em um esquema quando o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Add%2A> método é chamado.

trans-unit.source: If the call to <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Reprocess%2A> is successful, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.IsCompiled%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se a chamada para <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Reprocess%2A> for bem-sucedida, o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.IsCompiled%2A> está definida como `false`.

trans-unit.source: The Reprocess method should be used after a schema in the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> has been modified, after the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> has performed compilation.
trans-unit.target: O método reprocessar deve ser usado depois de um esquema no <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> tiver sido modificado, após o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> executou a compilação.

trans-unit.source: You need to call the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Reprocess%2A> method if you have changed a schema (or one of its includes/imports) after adding it to the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>.
trans-unit.target: Você precisa chamar o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Reprocess%2A> método se você tiver alterado um esquema (ou uma de suas inclui/importações) após adicioná-lo para o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Reprocess%2A> method will check the schema for structural validity according to the rules of W3C XML Schema.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Reprocess%2A> método verificará o esquema para validade estrutural acordo com as regras do esquema de XML da W3C.

trans-unit.source: However, it will not perform a full validation check.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, ele não executará uma verificação de validação completa.

trans-unit.source: It will also resolve references to internal and external schema components.
trans-unit.target: Ela também será resolvida referências a componentes de esquema internos e externos.

trans-unit.source: Any imported or included schemas that are successfully retrieved are also added to the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>.
trans-unit.target: Esquemas importadas ou incluídas que são recuperadas com êxito também são adicionadas para o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>.

trans-unit.source: Imported schemas are added as separate <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> objects while included schemas are made part of the including <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>.
trans-unit.target: Esquemas importados são adicionadas como separada <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> objetos enquanto incluídos esquemas são fazer parte do, inclusive <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>.

trans-unit.source: If the call to reprocess is successful, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.IsCompiled%2A> property is set to false.
trans-unit.target: Se a chamada para reprocessar for bem-sucedida, o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.IsCompiled%2A> está definida como false.

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates reprocessing a schema added to the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir ilustra o reprocessamento um esquema adicionado para o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>.

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> is compiled using the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Compile%2A> method, and the schema added to the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> is modified, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.IsCompiled%2A> property will be set to `true`, even though a schema in the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> has been modified.
trans-unit.target: Após o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> é compilada usando o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Compile%2A> método e o esquema adicionado ao <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> for modificado, o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.IsCompiled%2A> propriedade será definida como `true`, mesmo que um esquema no <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> foi modificado.

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Reprocess%2A> method performs all the preprocessing performed by the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Add%2A> method and sets the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.IsCompiled%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Chamando o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Reprocess%2A> método executa todos os pré-processamento executadas pelo <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Add%2A> método e conjuntos do <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.IsCompiled%2A> propriedade `false`.

trans-unit.source: The schema is not valid.
The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> object passed as a parameter is <see langword="null" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> object passed as a parameter does not already exist in the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" />.
Returns a collection of XML Schema definition language (XSD) schemas in the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" />.
Returns a collection of all the XML Schema definition language (XSD) schemas in the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" />.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> object containing all the schemas that have been added to the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" />.
If no schemas have been added to the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" />, an empty <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> object is returned.
This method returns schemas that were added indirectly to the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> because they were imported.
trans-unit.target: Este método retorna esquemas que foram adicionados ao indiretamente o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> porque eles foram importados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Schemas%2A> method is the equivalent of the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection.GetEnumerator%2A> method of the obsolete <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Schemas%2A> método é equivalente a <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection.GetEnumerator%2A> método o obsoleto <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection>.

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates how to iterate over all the schemas in the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir ilustra como iterar em todos os esquemas no <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>.

trans-unit.source: The schema <c>targetNamespace</c> property.
Returns a collection of all the XML Schema definition language (XSD) schemas in the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" /> that belong to the given namespace.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> object containing all the schemas that have been added to the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" /> that belong to the given namespace.
If no schemas have been added to the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet" />, an empty <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> object is returned.
If the `targetNamespace` parameter is `null` or <xref:System.String.Empty>, then all schemas without a namespace are returned.
trans-unit.target: Se o `targetNamespace` parâmetro é `null` ou <xref:System.String.Empty>, todos os esquemas sem um namespace serão retornadas.

trans-unit.source: This method returns schemas that were added indirectly to the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> because they were imported.
trans-unit.target: Este método retorna esquemas que foram adicionados ao indiretamente o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> porque eles foram importados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Schemas%2A> method is the equivalent of the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection.Item%2A> method of the obsolete <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Schemas%2A> método é equivalente a <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection.Item%2A> método o obsoleto <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCollection>.

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates how to iterate over all the schemas in the http://www.contoso.com/books namespace in the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir ilustra como iterar em todos os esquemas no http://www.contoso.com/books namespace o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>.

trans-unit.source: Specifies an event handler for receiving information about XML Schema definition language (XSD) schema validation errors.

Sets an event handler for receiving information about schema validation errors when the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Add%2A> or <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Compile%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> are called.
trans-unit.target: Define um manipulador de eventos para receber informações sobre erros de validação de esquema quando o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Add%2A> ou <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Compile%2A> métodos do <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> são chamados.

trans-unit.source: If an event handler is not defined, an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException> is thrown on any validation errors where the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSeverityType> is <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSeverityType.Error>.
trans-unit.target: Se um manipulador de eventos não está definido, um <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException> é gerada em erros de validação em que o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSeverityType> é <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSeverityType.Error>.

trans-unit.source: Exceptions are not thrown for validation errors with an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSeverityType> of <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSeverityType.Warning>.
trans-unit.target: Não são lançadas exceções para erros de validação com um <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSeverityType> de <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSeverityType.Warning>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates adding a <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.ValidationEventHandler> to capture errors and warnings when validating an XML document against a schema.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir ilustra a adição de um <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.ValidationEventHandler> para capturar erros e avisos ao validar um documento XML em um esquema.

trans-unit.source: The example uses the books.xml file as an input.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo usa o arquivo Books. XML como entrada.

trans-unit.source: The example uses the books.xsd file as an input.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo usa o arquivo Books como entrada.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" /> used to resolve namespaces or locations referenced in include and import elements of a schema.
The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" /> used to resolve namespaces or locations referenced in include and import elements of a schema.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" /> usado para resolver namespaces ou locais referenciados em incluem e importar elementos de um esquema.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> of an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> is used to resolve namespaces or locations referenced in include and import elements of a schema, any time a schema is added using the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Add%2A> or <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Reprocess%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> de um <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> é usado para resolver namespaces ou locais referenciados em incluem e importar elementos de um esquema, sempre um esquema é adicionado usando o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Add%2A> ou <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.Reprocess%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: External namespaces or locations referenced in include, import, and redefine elements of a schema are resolved with respect to the base URI of the schema that includes or imports them.
trans-unit.target: Incluem namespaces externos ou locais referenciados no, importar e elementos de redefinição de um esquema são resolvidos em relação ao URI de base do esquema que inclui ou importá-los.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the base URI of the including or importing schema is empty or `null`, the external locations are resolved with respect to the current directory.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se o URI de base do incluindo ou Importando esquema está vazio ou `null`, os locais externos são resolvidos em relação ao diretório atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver> class is used to resolve external schemas by default.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver> classe é usada para resolver esquemas externos por padrão.

trans-unit.source: To disable resolution of include, import, and redefine elements of a schema, set the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.XmlResolver%2A> property to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Para desabilitar a resolução de inclusão, importar e redefinir a elementos de um esquema, defina o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet.XmlResolver%2A> propriedade `null`.
